title: COP30 evacuated as fire erupts during UN climate talks in Brazil
text:
NewsFeed COP30 evacuated as fire erupts during UN climate talks in Brazil

A fire broke out at a COP30 climate conference venue in Belem, Brazil, prompting the evacuation of panicked delegates. Officials said there were no injuries and the fire has been extinguished.
summary: A fire broke out at a COP30 climate conference venue in Belem, Brazil, prompting the evacuation of panicked delegates.
